unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent. We at TCS see great potential in students from IIT Delhi & IIM Ahmedabad. Last year's hires are already excelling. Remember to check application deadlines by 25/12/2024! Interviews begin 08/01/2025 at 10:00 hrs. Salary packages start at Rs. 8 Lakhs. Wishing all applicants from Tamil Nadu the very best. Final results declared 15/02/2025. Jai Hind!
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent. We at T C S see great potential in students from I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad. Last year's hires are already excelling. Remember to check application deadlines by twenty fifth december two thousand and twenty four! Interviews begin eighth january two thousand and twenty five at ten o'clock hours. Salary packages start at rupees eight lakhs. Wishing all applicants from Tamil Nadu the very best. Final results declared fifteenth february two thousand and twenty five. Jai Hind!
